name: CCPWare
description:
Do things disliked by the CCP in this short microgames collection. Some microgames are about silly things banned there, like time travel and K-Pop and some other about more serious issue, like the Uyghur internment camps, or tiananmen square.

The games are played with either the mouse or the arrow keys excepted one played with the whole keyboard.

I was kindly asked to release a censored edition of the game (Censored Edition). This version features remixed, "censored" version of the 10 original microgames as well as a secret ending. I strongly suggest you play the regular edition before playing the censored one. 

Since, in my opinion, some of the remixed microgames have unintuitive controls, if you get stuck on one you can check the file microgames.txt  located in the folder tips. In this folder you can also find instruction on how to see the secret ending called secretending.txt.


CCPWare_win : The regular edition of the game
CCPWare-censorededition_win : The remixed edition of the game
